result.content:
We start by setting two path statements, the first is to the jar or folder that contains
the fitnium classes, and the second is to the Selenium Java client driver jar

classpath: fitnesse.jar
classpath: fitlibrary.jar
classpath: fitnium.jar
classpath: selenium-java-client-driver.jar

Fitnium is based on a DoFixture[?] and we instantiate it with the the following line

com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture
Could not find fixture: com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture.
